transportation.text:
[b]Standard hydrogen rocket[/b]

A standard hydrogen rocket. Enables travel to each planet either side of the base planet.
transportation.name: Standard hydrogen rocket

transportation.text:
[b]Side-booster hydrogen rocket[/b]

A standard hydrogen rocket equipped with side-boosters. Enables travel to two planets on either side of the base planet.
transportation.name: Side-booster equipped hydrogen rocket

transportation.text:
[b]Solar-sail equipped rocket[/b]

Side-booster hydrogen rocket carrying an additional payload outfitted with solar-sails. Can travel to planets of any distance.
transportation.name: Hydrogen rocket with solar-sails

storage.text:

Standard storage facility capable of holding up to XYZ of each resource
storage.name: Lv. 1 storage facility

storage.text:
[b]Lv. 2 storage facility[/b]

storage.name: Lv. 2 storage facility

storage.text:
[b]Lv. 3 storage facility[/b]

Significantly upgraded storage facility capable of holding up to XYZ of each resource
storage.name: Lv. 3 storage facility

technology_types.construct: Constructed immediately using an up-front cost
